creator: lan.huynh@gmail.com
text:
We have configured tomcat with the below values
Java Options with --XX:MaxPermSize=512 
Initial memory pool: 768
Maximum memory pool 768

Everything have been working for 2 years, recently all the above configuration was set back to the default values (the Java Options was removed and Initial memory pool was set back to 128, and Maximum memory pool was set back to 256) .  We are not sure if any server updates caused this issue.  When have tried to reconfigure the default values to the values above, we get the Http status 404 error.  We have to reinstall the tomcat to make it works and this issue come back about a month even if we don't make any changes to the server.

Is there any way to debug or resolve this issue?  Thank you.

Lan

creator: chris@christopherschultz.net
text: Unless this is a specific bug report against tomcat7.exe, you should ask your question on the users' mailing list.
can you tell me how I  submit this question to the users' mailing list?  Thank you.
creator: lan.huynh@gmail.com

text:
Join the (email) mailing list and send a message to it.

http://tomcat.apache.org/lists.html

You want the "tomcat-users" mailing list.
creator: chris@christopherschultz.net
lan.huynh@gmail.com
text: thank you so much for the quick response.  I really appreciate your time and supports.
